name: MailChimp Block
descriptionHtml:
Test

async () => {
  let blockId;
  await (0, _testSetup.step)(
    "Can visit the block editor and add a MailChimp block",
    async () => {
      blockId = await blockEditor.insertBlock(
        _mailchimp.default.name(),
        _mailchimp.default.title()
      );
    }
  );
  await (0, _testSetup.step)("Can connect to a MailChimp", async () => {
    const mcBlock = new _mailchimp.default(blockId, page);
    await mcBlock.connect();
  });
  await (0, _testSetup.step)(
    "Can publish a post and assert that MailChimp block is rendered",
    async () => {
      await blockEditor.selectPostTitle();
      await blockEditor.publishPost();
      await blockEditor.viewPost();
      const frontend = await _postFrontend.default.init(page);

      expect(
        await frontend.isRenderedBlockPresent(_mailchimp.default)
      ).toBeTruthy();
    }
  );
};
statusTrace: ConnectionsPage is not available after 3rd attempt
